pages.text: You should begin your journey as you would normally - chop down a tree, get some cobblestone, etc. Before you even start with Immersive Weapons, you'll need some basic resources.

A part of the experience is experimentation. Try doing things differently than you normally would.$(br2)Perhaps try breaking a log with a pickaxe? Or maybe put a cobblestone block in your crafting grid by itself.

As you progress, item tiers of wood and stone will be insufficient.$(br2)A decent tier to work with is iron. If you're struggling to find iron, copper is a good substitute. Those will get you through most challenges, before you have a good supply of high end items.
